page.title: 13School Census-Leicester
page.content: We took a census in our school. We gave everyone in the school a questionnaire to answer, and when they were answered we counted the answers. We found out that the{average family {size}was{five. {95%}of the children were born in{ {England,}and{2%}were born in{India. All the children in the school speak{ {English,}but{20%}of the children also speak{another language.}The most common languages after English are{ {Gujarati}and{Punjabi. {40%}of the children in the school have got a{microcomputer}at home. {80%}of the children have got a{bicycle of their own. {70%}of the cjildren have got some sort of a{pet,}the most common pet is a{ {dog. } {75%}of our{mothers}go to{work,}but most only work{part time.
